product_name: REI Midweight Polartec Power Dry Half Zip Top - Men's - 2014 Overstock
long_description: A warm, wicking base layer like the REI Midweight Polartec Power Dry Half Zip top can make the difference between cold-weather trips to remember and those you'd like to forget.
